mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.description, t1.module, t1.time_taken, t1.ip, t1.address, t1.browser, t1.os, t1.status, t1.error_msg, t1.create_user, t1.create_time, t2.nickname AS createUserString FROM sys_log AS t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user AS t2 ON t2.id = t1.create_user ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t1.id, t1.description, t1.module, t1.time_taken, t1.ip, t1.address, t1.browser, t1.os, t1.status, t1.error_msg, t1.create_user, t1.create_time, t2.nickname AS createUserString FROM sys_log AS t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user AS t2 ON t2.id = t1.create_user ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_log) AS total, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_log WHERE create_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND create_time < (CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day')) AS today, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_log WHERE create_time >= (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day') AND create_time < CURRENT_DATE) AS yesterday

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip) FROM sys_log) AS total, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip) FROM sys_log WHERE create_time >= CURRENT_DATE AND create_time < (CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day')) AS today, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip) FROM sys_log WHERE create_time >= (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day') AND create_time < CURRENT_DATE) AS yesterday
SELECT TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM') AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_log WHERE TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM') IN #{month} GROUP BY name ORDER BY name
SELECT TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM') AS name, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS value FROM sys_log WHERE TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM') IN #{month} GROUP BY name ORDER BY name

SELECT CASE WHEN POSITION(' ' IN address) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(address FROM 1 FOR POSITION(' ' IN address) - 1) ELSE address END AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_log WHERE address LIKE '中国%' GROUP BY name
SELECT DATE(create_time) AS date, COUNT(*) AS pvCount, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS ipCount FROM sys_log WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

SELECT
LPAD(CONCAT(FLOOR(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM create_time) / 2) * 2, ':00'), 5, '0') AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_log GROUP BY name ORDER BY name
SELECT module AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_log WHERE module != '验证码' AND module != '登录' GROUP BY name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT #{top}
SELECT os AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_log WHERE os IS NOT NULL GROUP BY name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT #{top}

SELECT CASE WHEN POSITION(' ' IN browser) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(browser FROM 1 FOR POSITION(' ' IN browser) - 1) ELSE browser END AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM sys_log WHERE browser IS NOT NULL GROUP BY name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT #{top}
